Catalogue

The catalogue template displays a collection of pages visually.

Available in: Squiz Matrix

The user can choose to view pages in a grid or list format. Pages can also be filtered by category and sorted.

Example (Education theme)

View template

Usage

  • Use this template to show content that should be browsed and compared.
  • Each item contains a title, brief description and thumbnail.
  • Each item can show a secondary data point (optional).
  • Pagination controls will appear when there are more than 12 items in the catalogue view.
  • This is a full-width template. It does not include the navigation sidebar.
  • Squiz Matrix users:
    • This template needs to be pre-configured before it’s available for use. Please contact platform administrators for more information.
    • Each item can only belong to one category.
